column1: Name,Package Name,Description,Rating,Rating Count
SMC Go,edu.smc.m,"Stay connected with SMC Go, the official app of Santa Monica College. Quickly access crucial campus resources while you are on the go.
SMC Go Features:

The SCVWD App,com.apprisemobile.scvwd,"The AquaGo App is the official app for those interested in and residents of, the Santa Clara Valley Water District. This mobile app provides you with interactive features and continuously updated content that will allow people who live in the Valley to track employees, gain information on the water district and more.  Features of the app include:
• Interact with other residents of the Valley by liking and commenting on content
• A directory that allows you to call and email important Valley contacts
• Alerts regarding the most recent news, events, and important information
• Streaming of videos both live and archived
• The ability to add upcoming events to native calendar
• Share content with others via your favorite social media channels and email
• . . . and more!",,
Go Santa Go Free,com.mapi.gosantagoios,"Go Santa Go! is the new Christmas runner game.
It's Christmas Eve and Santa’s sledge has gone out of control spilling presents all over the streets.
So now help Santa to collect as many presents as possible without being hit by traffic or trash.
The game gets progressively harder by increasing the speed and hazards!",,
Pocket Santa GO,alina.santago,"Santa GO
Love of the game where you can search for and collect the animal? Try our unique holiday, New Year's game with the search for the lost Santa and his friends!
Find all your friends and relatives santa. For a more interesting effect using the camera as augmented reality.
Collect the entire collection handheld toy Santa.
Features:
- Unique search on the map.
- Best Radar.
- A huge collection (Santa, snowman, reindeer, snow maiden, elves and many others!)
- Endless Search shells.
- Off line game.
- Completely free!
-And much more!
Begin the hunt for Santa now and you can not stop until you have collected the entire collection of pocket pets!
With nastupayushim New 2017 Year! Find all the magical characters until the new year and get a gift!",,
